name: vue-crud-x
description: NodeJS and VueJS Web Application Cookbook & a VueJS CRUD component

scripts.install-libs: cd app & npm i && cd ..\web\example-spa && npm i && cd ..\example-ssr && npm i
scripts.install-db: cd app\example-app && npx knex migrate:latest --env development&&npx knex seed:run --env development
scripts.dev:spa: concurrently "cd app && npm run-script dev" "cd ../web/example-spa && npm run-script serve"
scripts.dev:ssr: concurrently "cd app && npm run-script dev" "cd ../web/example-ssr && npm run-script dev"
scripts.dev:static: concurrently "cd app && npm run-script dev" "cd ../web/example-ssr && npm run-script serve"
